__e: Let him have a little brandy and water, if he'll take it.
For some reason, and I have no idea why Brandy always wanted to hang out with me.
I think I'd better have a brandy and soda.
Yes, and then we'll enjoy brandy and cigars.
Oh, well, blame brandy and old age, hmm?
I thought you'd ask me, so I brought the good brandy and the dress glass.
